conversation.message:
Max suffered a hip fracture and needs urgent surgery. He was hit by a car a week ago and has been under veterinary care since then.

The surgery is necessary for him to be able to walk again. We've already raised $15,000 of the $30,000 we need.

Would you like to help Max?

caseData.name: Max - Urgent Surgery
caseData.description: Max needs surgery for a hip fracture after being hit by a car.
